scripts.dev:all: npm run dev:api & npm run dev:admin
scripts.test:bun: bun test packages/core/src/__tests__ packages/core/src/webhooks/__tests__ packages/core/src/plugins/__tests__ packages/core/src/errors packages/cli/tests
scripts.test:node: node --import tsx --test $(find packages/core/src/__tests__ packages/core/src/webhooks/__tests__ packages/core/src/plugins/__tests__ packages/core/src/errors packages/cli/tests -name '*.test.ts')
scripts.test:deno: deno test --allow-read --allow-env --allow-write --no-check packages/core/src/__tests__ packages/core/src/webhooks/__tests__ packages/core/src/plugins/__tests__ packages/core/src/errors packages/cli/tests
scripts.test:all: npm run test:bun && npm run test:deno && npm run test:node
